languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс отвечает таким же сдержанным кивком.{/n} "Доброго дня, Наместник. Я сопровождаю Вольного Торговца. Не обращайте внимания на мое присутствие".
{n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс отвечает таким же сдержанным кивком.{/n} "Доброго дня, Наместник. Я сопровождаю Вольного Торговца. Не обращайте внимания на мое присутствие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

{n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスも同じく控えめにうなずいて答える。{/n}「どうも、領主殿。俺は自由開拓者に同行している。どうかいないものとして扱ってくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスも同じく控えめにうなずいて答える。{/n}「どうも、領主殿。俺は自由開拓者に同行している。どうかいないものとして扱ってくれ」

languages.text: {n}海因里希同样含蓄地点头回应。{/n}“你好，总督。我是行商浪人的随行人员，请不必在意我的存在。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希同样含蓄地点头回应。{/n}“你好，总督。我是行商浪人的随行人员，请不必在意我的存在。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix responde con un gesto igual de reservado.{/n} «Saludos, Señor. Vengo en acompañamiento {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Le ruego que no preste atención a mi presencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix responde con un gesto igual de reservado.{/n} «Saludos, Señor. Vengo en acompañamiento {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Le ruego que no preste atención a mi presencia».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lui répond d'un hochement de tête tout aussi réservé.{/n} « Bonjour, suzerain. J'accompagne {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ne faites pas attention à moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lui répond d'un hochement de tête tout aussi réservé.{/n} « Bonjour, suzerain. J'accompagne {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ne faites pas attention à moi. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix antwortet mit einem ebenso reservierten Nicken.{/n} "Guten Tag, Lehnsherr. Ich begleite {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Bitte beachtet meine Anwesenheit gar nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix antwortet mit einem ebenso reservierten Nicken.{/n} "Guten Tag, Lehnsherr. Ich begleite {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Bitte beachtet meine Anwesenheit gar nicht."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir o kadar ölçülü bir baş hareketiyle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "İyi günler Emîr. Hür Tacir'e eşlik ediyorum. Varlığıma aldırma lütfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix responds with an equally reserved nod.{/n} "Good day, Liege. I am accompanying the Rogue Trader. Please pay no mind to my presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix eşit derecede vakur bir baş hareketiyle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "İyi günler Emîr. Hür Tacir'e eşlik ediyorum. Lütfen varlığıma aldırma."
